text: Polylepis incana is a species of plant in the family Rosaceae. It is found in Ecuador, Peru, and possibly Colombia.https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/these-fairytale-trees-only- grow-at-incredible-altitudes It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== incana Category:Flora of the Andes Category:Páramo flora Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Trees of Peru Category:Trees of Ecuador Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Polylepis incana
